plot: Jeremy tests luxurious cars such as the Mercedes-Benz S-Class; the Audi A8; and the Bentley Arnage T, as Richard enjoys a ride in the Mercedes Maybach 62 and reveals a budget Bond Car. Jonathan Ross is the next star in the Suzuki Liana.

Richard turns a Rover 820 into a cut-price Bond car, complete with gadgets, on a £300 budget. Richard goes to Germany to drive the £280,000 Mercedes Maybach 62, while Jeremy tries to test drive the much cheaper Mercedes-Benz S Class. The Stig drives the Bentley Arnage around the test track. Jonathan Ross is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots

Jeremy enters the luxurious world of big and expensive cars such as the technologically-advanced, Mercedes-Benz S-Class; the lavish, Audi A8; and the powerful, Bentley Arnage T. As Richard enjoys an unforgettable ride in the extraordinary £280,000 Mercedes Maybach 62, the Top Gear team reveals the show's inexpensive but totally effective budget Bond Car. Finally, British actor, Jonathan Ross, is the next star in a reasonably-priced car--the Suzuki Liana GLX.—Nick Riganas
